long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Graspr is a utility that lets users track what they learn, follow friends and communities and discuss over what others are learning. It is designed to enable you learn more. The chrome extension lets you highlight text from the web and add it to your list of grasps in one click.
